about_the_game:
EDYN plunges you into a dynamic multiplayer realm where you forge mighty settlements, command vast armies, and clash with rivals in epic PvP warfare with no Pay-to-Win or catchup mechanics. Embark on a grand quest to shape a living world with your strategic brilliance, forging alliances and conquering foes to etch your legacy into EDYN's history. In a land teetering on the brink of chaos, only the sharpest minds will unify the realms and bring order to EDYN.

Build, Expand, and Conquer!

Your journey begins with one of eight distinct factions, each offering their unique perspective of the world. Your faction can also determine your allies and rivals. Although considered teammates, the sandbox nature of EDYN means that these bonds are not set in stone. You have the freedom to forge or break alliances whenever you see fit. Should you wish, fallen members of your faction can be revived back into the world of EDYN in order to assist your cause. Though beware, reclaiming a fallen ally’s settlement is no small feat. In an ever-evolving world, your choices define your destiny. Will you unite under a common banner or carve your own path to supremacy?

Begin your journey by constructing essential structures to gather vital resources like gold, wood and food for your troops. Transform your humble settlement into a sprawling empire. Delve into deep resource management, balancing production and expenditure to fuel your expansion. Invest wisely in building enhancements, army recruitment, and technological advancements to outpace your rivals. Your economic acumen will be the backbone of your dominance.

Assemble an unstoppable force from a diverse selection of units, each with unique strengths and battlefield roles. Whether you prefer overwhelming foes with sheer numbers or deploying elite squads for precision strikes, tailor your military to reflect your unique strategy and ambitions. From your War Room, lead grand campaigns against NPC settlements and rival players. Launch daring raids to seize resources, deploy specialist units to crush enemy defenses, and halt their offensive. Conquer all of EDYN and assert your supremacy.

Forge powerful alliances and engage in intricate diplomacy. Utilize in-game chat and direct messaging to conspire with allies, negotiate pacts, and influence the world's fate. Support your friends with resources or troops, and together, leave an indelible mark on EDYN.

In EDYN, the true test lies not just in expanding your territory or advancing your settlement, but achieving legendary status. Through cunning diplomacy or decisive warfare, make your mark on a world where only the most exceptional rise to the top. Attain the ultimate accolade—exclusive, ultra-rare cosmetics reserved for the elite. These unique rewards persist across new servers, eternally showcasing your unmatched status for all to see. Do you have what it takes to seize the crown and become a legend, forever woven into the history of EDYN? There’s only one way to find out.

Stand out on the battlefield with extensive customization options for your avatar. Unlock exclusive cosmetics through seasonal events, achievements, and progression milestones. Express your identity and let your legend be known throughout the realms.

Note: Our in-game shop is purely for in-game cosmetics and will not impose an advantage or in-game mechanic advantage for participating. 

Be among the first to shape EDYN's future. Dive into exclusive Early Access content and experience new features before anyone else. Connect with our community on Discord, share your insights, and influence the game's development with your feedback.

A world on the brink awaits a leader. Gather your forces, strategize your conquest, and embark on an epic journey to become a legend in EDYN.

name: EDYN

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card with 2 GB VRAM (such as NVIDIA GTX 1050 or AMD RX 460)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join the battle for EDYN, the ultimate multiplayer strategy game. Build settlements, command armies, and unify the realms in epic PvP warfare to etch your legacy into history. Raid, loot, make alliances, and unite to conquer the planet itself, with no Pay-To-Win mechanics to upset the playing field.
